name: Seek-out
description:
Description

Seek-out is a 3D top-down view party game where you play as a guide from a funny species, the Bobbas, trying to gather your lost tourists during a city tour.
This game was created in 48h as a team project for the Global Game Jam 2021, and features 3 different levels. 

Objective

Gather the required number of tourists inside the rally point before the timer runs out.

Controls
  • Keyboard and Mouse :
    • Use the arrows or the WASD keys to move your character
    • Click to use your whistle, and the bobba tourists that can hear you will run in the direction of your cursor
Team
